coordination-setup.title: Multi-Agent Testing Coordination Setup
coordination-setup.description: Establish coordination framework and protocols for multi-agent testing workflow

subtasks.title: Define agent roles and responsibilities
subtasks.description: Clearly define roles, responsibilities, and boundaries for each agent

subtasks.title: Establish communication protocols
subtasks.description: Define communication patterns, escalation paths, and reporting structures

subtasks.title: Configure quality gates
subtasks.description: Define quality gates and validation criteria for each agent

subtasks.title: Setup coordination workflows
subtasks.description: Create sequential and parallel workflow patterns for agent coordination

tdd-workflow-implementation.title: TDD RED-GREEN-REFACTOR Workflow Implementation
tdd-workflow-implementation.description: Implement comprehensive TDD workflow with multi-agent coordination

subtasks.title: Create RED phase procedures
subtasks.description: Establish procedures for writing failing tests and validation

subtasks.title: Create GREEN phase procedures
subtasks.description: Establish procedures for minimal implementation to pass tests

subtasks.title: Create REFACTOR phase procedures
subtasks.description: Establish procedures for code improvement while maintaining test coverage

subtasks.title: Create TDD automation scripts
subtasks.description: Create automation scripts for TDD workflow execution

security-validation-setup.title: Security and Performance Validation Setup
security-validation-setup.description: Establish security scanning and performance validation workflows

subtasks.title: Configure security scanning tools
subtasks.description: Setup OWASP scanning, vulnerability detection, and compliance checking

subtasks.title: Configure performance monitoring
subtasks.description: Setup bundle size analysis, Core Web Vitals monitoring, and performance tracking

subtasks.title: Create security validation procedures
subtasks.description: Establish procedures for security validation and compliance checking

accessibility-testing-setup.title: Accessibility and UI Testing Setup
accessibility-testing-setup.description: Establish WCAG 2.1 AA+ compliance testing and UI validation workflows

subtasks.title: Configure accessibility testing tools
subtasks.description: Setup axe-core, screen reader testing, and keyboard navigation validation

subtasks.title: Configure responsive testing
subtasks.description: Setup mobile-first responsive design validation across device breakpoints

subtasks.title: Create visual testing procedures
subtasks.description: Establish procedures for visual regression testing and design consistency

architecture-validation-setup.title: Architecture Validation Setup
architecture-validation-setup.description: Establish architecture compliance and design pattern validation workflows

subtasks.title: Configure architecture validation tools
subtasks.description: Setup architecture pattern validation and design compliance checking

subtasks.title: Create integration testing procedures
subtasks.description: Establish procedures for API contract validation and data flow testing

subtasks.title: Create scalability validation procedures
subtasks.description: Establish procedures for performance under load and scalability testing

integration-validation.title: Multi-Agent Integration Validation
integration-validation.description: Validate end-to-end coordination between all agents and workflows

subtasks.title: Test sequential workflow coordination
subtasks.description: Validate that sequential workflows execute correctly with proper handoffs

subtasks.title: Test parallel workflow coordination
subtasks.description: Validate that parallel workflows execute efficiently without conflicts

subtasks.title: Test quality gate enforcement
subtasks.description: Validate that quality gates are properly enforced across all agents

subtasks.title: Test communication protocols
subtasks.description: Validate that communication protocols work effectively between agents

universal: All agents have defined roles and responsibilities
Communication protocols are established and documented
Quality gates are defined for each agent
Coordination workflows are implemented and tested

tdd-orchestrator: Automation scripts are created and tested
